user.title: Temporary Entities
user.description: Set up the Temporary Entities integration to manage short-lived entities with automatic cleanup.

init.title: Temporary Entities Options
init.description: Configure how temporary entities are managed and cleaned up.

data_description.min_persist_duration: Entities with expected duration shorter than this won't be saved to disk. Range: 1-300 seconds.
data_description.cleanup_interval: How often to check for expired entities. Range: 60-3600 seconds (1-60 minutes).
data_description.finalized_grace_period: How long to keep finalized entities before cleanup. Range: 0-300 seconds.
data_description.inactive_max_age: How long to keep paused/inactive entities before cleanup. Range: 3600-604800 seconds (1 hour - 1 week).

pause.name: Pause Temporary Entity
pause.description: Pause a temporary entity (if supported by the entity type).
